channel.title: Inspiration on PR
channel.description: Recent content in Inspiration on PR

item.title: Book Recommendations
item.description: I was too lazy to write blog post for a long time. To break my lazy streak, here is something I wanted to write and procrastinated for at-least 6 months.

item.title: Dev Diary
item.description: This is something I’ve started in Jan ‘15. This is to practice a habit of keeping a log of stuff I do which took me a lot of time to figure out myself (may be I’m not efficient?

item.title: Book recommendation : Creativity Inc by Ed Catmull
item.description: It is no surprise that you know about Pixar if you are even remotely knew Steve Jobs and his history. And you definitely heard about Pixar’s movies Toy story, Finding Nemo, Wall-E, Up & more.

item.title: Some funniest moments from my appraisal
item.description: I had my one-on-one meeting for 2012-13 appraisal this week. I was disappointed with the feedback given to me. Well, I have been _work_ing for very long time, and I know if you are not hurt then it is not an appraisal.

item.title: Book Recommendation: Testing with coffeescript by Jack Franklin [Free ebook]
item.description: TDD (Test Driven Development) was introduced to me around 2006 with PHPUnit. As a naive, I couldn’t see the benefits, eg.

item.title: Idea Vault: Prj - Dug Me
item.description: Task management app with little twist. Yep, Dug instead of clippy while nagging. Idea is to log all our project ideas similar to logging notes in nvALT.

item.title: Project Dumps
item.description: Wish you all a very happy new year! It is 2013, another chance for us/me to start a new beginning. I believed in Mayan so much, I never had a plan post 20th Dec 2012 :)

item.title: Randy Pausch Last Lecture: Achieving Your Childhood Dreams
item.description: Content requires Javascript to be enabled. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ji5_MqicxSo p.noscript{ background-color: #fefea0; border-left: 4px solid #fea0a0; padding: 0 0.25em; } Youtube - Randy Pausch Last Lecture | Achieving Your Childhood Dreams

item.title: RIP - Steven P. Jobs
item.description: The people who are crazy enough to think they can change the world, are the ones who do.

item.title: iTunes 10 Logo
item.description: End credits from the movie Up iTunes logo updated with version 10 in Sep ‘10

item.title: Wallpaper - Testflight app
item.description: I really liked the background image pattern used in testflightapp.com. It is so cool that I have replaced my all time favorite iPad-Safari-fabric texture to gray varient given below.

item.title: Shane Warne - The Leader
item.description: Color me surprised, I was amazed by his replies. Here is my favourite one Harsha Bhogle: What you strive to do as a leader?
